text:
Mild warning if you are using Hyper-V and Veeam with RCT. not saying everyone is affected, but you could be. Be careful. https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/azure-stack/starting-vms-may-fail-after-installation-of-10-2023-cu-when/m-p/3956844/highlight/true#M148
 Best regards, Karl Wester-Ebbinghaus Senior IT Consultant -- %2479cfb090%246d6f11b0%24%40chynet.de

metadata.topic: Starting VMs may fail after installation of 10-2023 CU when Veeam RCT is being used
metadata.email_text_clean:
Mild warning if you are using Hyper-V and Veeam with RCT. not saying everyone is affected, but you could be. Be careful. https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/azure-stack/starting-vms-may-fail-after-installation-of-10-2023-cu-when/m-p/3956844/highlight/true#M148
